text: Ryan Reeves (born November 10, 1981 in Las Vegas, Nevada) is an American professional wrestler. He formally wrestled for the WWE under the ring name Ryback. He was formerly known under the ring name Skip Sheffield and was a former member of the wrestling stable, The Nexus. On November 24th, Ryback would tweet on X saying that if Cm punk returned at wweâ€™s PLE Survivor series in Chicago he would retire from professional wrestling. A day later Cm punk would shockingly return at survivor series thus putting an end to rybacks career. ==Championships== *Ohio Valley Wrestling **OVW Heavyweight Championship (one time) *Pro Wrestling Illustrated **PWI Feud of the Year (2010) - The Nexus vs. WWE **PWI Most Hated Wrestler of the Year (2010) - as a member of The Nexus **He was ranked #218 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500. (2010) **He was ranked #112 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500. (2012) *World Wrestling Entertainment **Slammy Award for the Shocker of the Year (2010) - The debut of The Nexus **WWE United States Champion (two times) **WWE Intercontinental Champion (one time) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Las Vegas
title: Ryback
